   16: -module(cassandra_SUITE).
   17: -compile(export_all).
   18: 
   19: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus.hrl").
   20: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   21: 
   22: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   23: %% Suite configuration
   24: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   25: 
   26: all() ->
   27:     [{group, cassandra_group}].
   28: 
   29: groups() ->
   30:      [{cassandra_group, [sequence], test_cases()}].
   31: 
   32: test_cases() -> [check_connection].
   33: 
   34: suite() ->
   35:     escalus:suite().
   36: 
   37: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   38:     escalus:init_per_suite(Config).
   39: 
   40: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   41:     escalus:end_per_suite(Config).
   42: 
   43: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   44:     Config.
   45: 
   46: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   47:     Config.
   48: 
   49: init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
   50:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
   51: 
   52: end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
   53:     escalus:end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
   54: 
   55: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   56: %% Last tests
   57: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   58: check_connection(Config) ->
   59:     case escalus_ejabberd:rpc(mongoose_cassandra, status, []) of
   60:         disabled ->
   61:             ct:pal("Cassandra is not configured", []);
   62:         ok ->
   63:             ct:pal("Cassandra is connected", []);
   64:         failure ->
   65:             ct:fail("Cassandra is configured but not connected", [])
   66:     end.
